question: You have applied for a senior position at a well-known tech firm. Write a letter to the HR manager expressing your enthusiasm for the position and requesting further details on the interview process.
You are hosting a weekend barbecue and want to invite your colleagues. Write a casual message to your team, giving them the details and asking them to RSVP.
You recently bought a new laptop and are experiencing issues with it. Write a letter to the customer support team, explaining the problem and requesting assistance.
You are writing to a former professor to ask for a letter of recommendation for a graduate program. In your letter, remind them of your work and request the recommendation.
You are throwing a surprise birthday party for your friend. Write a message to a mutual friend, inviting them to the party and giving them the details.
You need to submit a project late due to unforeseen circumstances. Write an email to your professor explaining the situation and requesting an extension.
You are booking a holiday apartment and want to inquire about the available dates, amenities, and pricing. Write a letter to the property manager to get more information.
Write a letter to your friend thanking them for their hospitality during your stay and inviting them to visit you soon.
You are a team lead working on a project and need to inform your team about some important changes in the project timeline. Write an email to your team explaining the changes and next steps.
You attended a networking event and met someone who could be a valuable connection for your career. Write a follow-up email thanking them for the conversation and suggesting a future meeting.
